description:
Scarlet`s behavior at the ball has unexpected consequences, including a direct attempt on her life!
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Kobushi no Aji o Oshiete Sashiageru, Kore o Shukujo no Tashinami to Shite mo Yoroshii Deshouka
May I Offer You the Taste of My Fist as the Ladylike Thing to Do?
拳の味を教えて差し上げる, これを淑女の嗜みとしてもよろしいでしょうか
